title: uBlock Origin GPL code being stolen by team behind honey browser extension
author: extesy
aiHeadline: The Great uBlock Origin Heist: Because Who Needs Originality When You Can Just Steal Someone Else's Code, Right? The Team Behind Honey Browser Extension is Accused of Stealing uBlock Origin's GPL Code, Because Apparently They Didn't Get the Memo About Not Being a Bunch of Code Thieves

title: MitmProxy2Swagger: Automagically reverse-engineer REST APIs
author: AbuAssar
aiHeadline: MitmProxy2Swagger: Because Reverse-Engineering REST APIs is Now as Easy as Clicking a Button, Thanks to This Amazing New Tool That's About to Make All Your API-Related Dreams Come True, or Your Worst Nightmares, Depending on How You Choose to Use It

title: The GPU, not the TPM, is the root of hardware DRM
author: DvdGiessen
aiHeadline: The GPU: The Real Villain Behind Hardware DRM, Not the TPM, Because Who Needs Security When You Can Just Blame it on the Graphics Card, and Now We Know the Truth, Thanks to This Groundbreaking Revelation That's About to Change the Way We Think About Digital Rights Management Forever

title: Zasper: A Modern and Efficient Alternative to JupyterLab, Built in Go
author: thunderbong
aiHeadline: Zasper: The New Kid on the Block, a Modern and Efficient Alternative to JupyterLab, Built in Go, Because Who Needs JupyterLab When You Can Have Something New and Shiny, and Possibly Even Better, But Let's Be Real, We'll Believe it When We See It

title: Tell HN: Impassable Cloudflare challenges are ruining my browsing experience
author: blakeashleyjr
aiHeadline: The Cloudflare Conundrum: Impassable Cloudflare Challenges are Ruining the Browsing Experience for Some, Because Who Doesn't Love a Good Game of 'Guess the Captcha' or 'Wait 30 Seconds to Access This Website', Said No One Ever, and Now We're All Stuck in This Never-Ending Cycle of Frustration
